title: Spring minestrone soup with pesto
description: This light and summery soup makes the most of springtime vegetables, don't forget a dollop of pesto on top.Try freezing this soup in portion-sized containers - it will keep for 2 months.Each serving provides 220kcal, 4.5g protein, 16g carbohydrate (of which 8g sugars), 14g fat (of which 4g saturates), 4g fibre and	2.2g salt.
ingredients: 1 leek, halved lengthways and thinly sliced
2 litres/3½ pints beef or vegetable stock
salt and freshly ground black pepper
